description: This file defines a React component for the Watchlist page of a stock insights dashboard. It fetches a watchlist from an API, displays the list in a table, and includes UI elements for navigation and filtering.

methods.name: WatchlistPage()
methods.description: React functional component displaying the user's watchlist with filtering and navigation.

ctags.name: [ { key: "symbol", header: "Symbol", render: (r) => ( <Link to={`/stocks/${encodeURIComponent(r.symbol)}`} className="mono" style={{ color: "var(--color-primary)" }}> {r.symbol} </ ), }, { key: "name", header: "Name" }, { key: "price", header: "Price", render: (r) => <span className="mono">{r.price.toFixed(2)}</ { key: "changePct", header: "Change", render: (r) => ( <Badge tone={r.changePct >= 0 ? "blue" : "amber"}> <span className="mono">{r.changePct >= 0 ? "+" : ""}{r.changePct.toFixed(2)}%</ </ ), }, { key: "rating", header: "Rating" }, ]
